thread.title: China Eases Controls on Western Digital as State Firm Plans to Invest
thread.title_full: China Eases Controls on Western Digital as State Firm Plans to Invest - WSJ

author: Eva Dou
title: China Eases Controls on Western Digital as State Firm Plans to Invest
text:
BEIJING—China has loosened some restrictions on Western Digital Corp.’s acquisition of rival Hitachi Global Storage Technologies Ltd., weeks after the disk-drive maker agreed to sell a stake to an influential Chinese state-run company.
China’s commerce ministry said Monday that it would now allow U.S.-based Western Digital and Hitachi Global Storage to combine their manufacturing and research operations, although they must maintain... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
